name: Ghost busting (ChocolateCookieBro)
description:
Shoot ghosts with your shotgun to earn as many points as possible! Don't let the ghosts touch the red line or its game over. 

left and right arrow to move

up arrow to shoot

Made with Clickteam Fusion: https://www.clickteam.com/

Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
